snippet: The reality show "Start-Ups: Silicon Valley" on Bravo was uniformly panned by critics, who thought it offered few insights into how the Valley really worked, and was not quite grotesque enough to be entertaining.
abstract: The reality show "Start-Ups: Silicon Valley" on Bravo was uniformly panned by critics, who thought it offered few insights into how the Valley really worked, and was not quite grotesque enough to be entertaining.

headline.main: Review Roundup: The Silicon Valley Reality Show
